instruction: Devise a strategic plan for a fashion brand to increase its online presence.
output: The strategic plan for the fashion brand should include setting up an online presence on major social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) and creating engaging content which could include news on fashion trends and tips, interviews of fashion designers, and visuals of the fashion products in action. By leveraging the advantages of social media, the fashion brand can increase its visibility and reach a larger customer base. Additionally, the fashion brand should consider utilizing search engine optimization tools and tools to monitor the website’s performance to ensure better search engine rankings.
